Class Academics

  • java.lang.Object
    • Academics

  • public class Academics
extends java.lang.Object

    Academics

    The Academics program implements an application that simply ask for students details and marks of different subjects and print the results based on marks entered
    Since:
    2019-04-19

      • ranksort

        public void ranksort(float[][] marks,
                     int avg_col,
                     int rank_col)
        1. Takes marks of perticular term 2. Calculates Rank based on percentage 3. Assigns rank to each student
        Parameters:
        marks - firstterm, secondterm or cummulative
        avg_col - column in which average is stored
        rank_col - column in which rank is to be stored
